title: Diagnose AI
description: A medical chatbot leveraging Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) to provide accurate disease predictions and recommendations. Improved response accuracy by 25% and reduced health info access time by 40%.

title: IMDB Sentiment Analysis
description: Designed a sentiment analysis model for IMDB reviews, achieving 92% accuracy. Processed 50,000+ reviews using tokenization, stemming, and word embeddings for feature extraction.

title: Mushroom-SafeSpotter
description: Developed a Streamlit app for mushroom classification, achieving 96% accuracy for public safety. Trained on 8,000+ samples using Scikit-Learn, attaining an F1-score of 0.96.

title: Financial AI
description: A machine learning model for financial analysis and stock prediction. Utilized deep learning techniques to analyze stock trends and predict future values with improved accuracy.

title: Portfolio Website
description: Developed a personal portfolio website using React to showcase projects, achievements, and contact details with a modern UI and responsive design.
